message.content:
cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.SOC, cs.IR, cs.DL 

The paper discusses the automated analysis of social media data, specifically Twitter, using a matrix approach to map co-occurring actors and topics in online debates. This falls under the categories of social media analysis (cs.SOC), natural language processing (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), and machine learning (cs.DL). Additionally, the paper discusses the theoretical and methodological implications of their approach, which could also fall under the category of social computing (cs.SI).
